page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Most of the work to be found in Low Port's survey area is agricultural or through Lothian Region's Park Ranger Service. Mr and Mrs Aitken, the largest farm owners in the area, employ ten men. this does not seem to be a lot of people for all the land and the thousand head of cattle and the sheep.The work is covered because the Riccarton and other farms in this family are highly mechanised. Mr and Mrs Taylor, who farms Wester Ochiltree, employs two full-time workers. Mr Taylor works a very long day. The park Rangers are the other employed people in our survey area of the park.As well as six full time Rangers there are several Youth Training Scheme part_time workers.
